   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to rvTTS's documentation!
=================================

rvTTS is a cli tool for converting text to mp3 files using ResponsiveVoice's API.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Documentation

   install
   usage
   examples
   license
   credits
   changelog

Project
=======
* `Github <https://github.com/tinotk>`_
* `PyPI Package <https://pypi.python.org/pypi/rvtts>`_
* `Documentation <https://rvtts.readthedocs.org>`_
* `truyen.thuvienbao <https://truyen.thuvienbao.com>`_
